content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to real-time information, but I can tell you that Metallica regularly schedules concerts and tours around the world. Due to the COVID-19 pandemic, many tours and concerts have been postponed or canceled. However, you can check their official website or social media accounts to find out about any future tour dates and locations as they become available. Alternatively, you can sign up for their mailing list to receive updates about their concerts and events.
